text: Riffat Hassan (born 1943 in Lahore) is a Pakistani-American feminist and Islamic scholar of the Quran.Susan N Cahill 'Wise Women', New York:Norton & Co, 1996 She studied from Durham University, England and later moved to the United States. She has taught at schools including Oklahoma State University and Harvard University, and is currently a professor of Religious Studies at the University of Louisville, Kentucky She is a strong supporter of 'Progressive Islam' and of the right of abortion and to the access to contraception for Muslim women. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Abortion-rights activists Category:Academics from Oklahoma Category:American feminists Category:American Muslims Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Pakistani Muslims Category:People from Lahore Category:Pakistani academics Category:Academics from Kentucky Category:Harvard University faculty Category:Alumni of the University of Durham
